name: Sqoon
summary: Sqoon is a side-scrolling shooter game published in 1986 by Irem for the Nintendo Entertainment System.

name: Square Deal: The Game of Two Dimensional Poker
Squinkies 2: Adventure Mall Surprize!
summary:
It’s here – the much anticipated announcement of the second Squinkies game for the Nintendo DS!
 Following the success of Squinkies, Squinkies 2: Adventure Mall Surprize! puts players back into the squishy, squashy Squinkies universe with revolutionized gameplay and an exciting new adventure on their Nintendo DS.
 Players can explore the newly-opened Adventure Mall Surprize, meeting new Squinkies along the way. Using their squishy, squashy talents, players will bounce
 their way around the mall to invite as many friends as possible to the Squinkies party.
Gameplay features 4 distinct areas with sixteen stages in total: the Aquarium, Food Court, Wedding Castle and Amusement Park. Squinkies are on the loose within each area and players must track them down to invite them to the party! Meeting new friends will unlock playable characters in later areas and magical coins scattered randomly about the levels are used in the Gumball Playhouse to earn ten “rare” playable Squinkies characters. In addition to playable characters, there are more than 600 Squinkies to be found and collected throughout the game! With simple controls, exciting game play and adorable familiar faces, Squinkies 2: Adventure Mall Surprize! will be an instant favorite.

name: Squad
summary: Squad is a large scale combined arms multiplayer first-person shooter emphasizing combat realism through communication, team play, emphasizing strong squad cohesion mechanics as well as larger-scale coordination, tactics, and planning. It features 20 large open maps, vehicle-based combined arms gameplay, and player-constructed bases to create a heart-thumping, visceral gaming experience with split-second decision-making in real-world scale firefights.

name: Squishy the Suicidal Pig
summary: Squishy the Suicidal Pig has made a deal with the devil and will do anything to reach his parents in heaven. This is a hard-going platformer with various puzzle elements.

name: Squirt's Adventure
summary: Squirt's Adventure is a word game designed to help children associate new words with letters of the Alphabet. Tag along with the cheerful pirates Squirt and Captain Dungee on their quest for treasure. Use your alphabet and vocabulary skills to help them find the golden loot. From the serene Purple Canyons to the rocks of Wreck Reef, you'll have fun popping bubbles, collecting sand dollars, and finding that elusive treasure!

name: Squirbs
summary: Squirbs is a challenging puzzle-platformer in which you control two cute blue Squirbs simultaneously with one set of controls. Looking for an awesomely difficult game? That's Squirbs.

name: Squadron 42
summary: Take the role of a rookie UEE Navy combat pilot in a cinematic single-player epic adventure set in the Star Citizen universe. Battle in the stars and face-to-face as you seamlessly transition between dogfighting and ground combat. Serve aboard a massive Navy capital ship as your custom character interacts and builds relationships with a living, breathing crew. Cutting-edge performance capture brings unprecedented emotion and life to some of your favorite actors. Powered by Lumberyard, Squadron 42 pushes gaming graphics and fidelity to the next level.

name: Squids Odyssey
summary: Squids Odyssey is a unique mix of action strategy and RPG: build your team of Squid heroes for epic turn-based battles against corrupted crabs and shrimps! Steev, Vahine and the rest of the Squids are in danger! An infectious black ooze is corrupting their world. The band of unlikely heroes need to fight back to save their underwater kingdom! Squids Odyssey is not just about gorgeous cartoon art, jaunty music and humorous storytelling, the battles also provide a deep challenge as strategy and skill are required to use the environment, the Squids’ strengths, and enemies’ weaknesses to victory!

name: Squids
summary: SQUIDS is a unique mix of action strategy and RPG: build your team of heroes for epic turn-based battles against corrupted crabs and shrimps! Steev, Vahine and the rest of the Squids are in danger! An infectious black ooze is corrupting their world. Only a few heroes can fight back and save their lush underwater kingdoms! Recruit a small army of stretchy Squids and lead them into turn-based battles against the dark hordes.

name: Squids Wild West
summary: Squids Wild West has a unique mix of action strategy and RPG: build your team of heroes for challenging turn-based battles against corrupted crabs and shrimp! This sequel is even better than the first game, with many surprises in store: devious new enemies, four new playable characters, and nearly twice as many levels.

name: Squid Hero for Kinect
summary: Play as a Squid Hero in this single-player/local co-op Kinect game developed by Virtual Air Guitar Company.

name: Squeeballs Party
summary: Squeeballs are small creatures manufactured on a secret island somewhere in the Pacific Ocean. Before they can be sold to children as toys around the world, Squeeballs must be fully tested…to the point of destruction. That's where the player comes in. They blow up, slice, smack, punch, bowl, shoot and skim the Squeeballs through 11 main game challenges.

name: Squeeze Box
summary:
Squeeze Box is a single player, full color game designed to be played on the Atari Video Computer System or the Sears Video Arcade. There are six game variations to test your skill and judgment.

Squeeze Box is the ultimate escape game. Our pistol packin' jailbird has got to shoot like crazy to knock out an escape route through the walls... before they close in on him. The longer it takes, the faster they come, so aim carefully. But don't rush out too fast because the next room is worse, and you're getting points for each block you shoot out.

Test your endurance! Wait too long and you might touch the wall. Three touches and its all over - except for the hottest finish you have ever encountered in a video game.

name: Squish 'em
summary: A action game written by Tony Ngo that was published for various 8-bit platforms. The player controls Sam who must climb to the top of a 48 story building and collect a suitcase full of money while avoiding being knocked off the building by a variety of creepy creatures or falling objects.

name: SquareCells
summary: SquareCells is an ambient logic puzzle game.

name: Squake
summary:
SQUAKE is the well loved classical “Snake” game with a mix of full-steam battle mechanics. Think of it as of Snake+Quake! Quite clever, eh? We thought so.

It’s a multiplayer action-packed combat-trains game! Collect cars to become longer. Destroy other trains and try to not die by hitting yourself because that would be totally embarrassing for a train to do.

We have 10 unique arenas with traps, power-ups, medals, trophies and all kinds of different game modes: deathmatch, team towers, domination, capture the flag, endless mode!

Oh, and you can decorate your train with all kinds of different fancy smokes and ride in style!

CHO-CHOO to GLORY!

name: Squadd.Io
summary:
Challenge your friends and the world in a new and crazy .io shoot'em up.
How long will you survive?

The rules of game are very simple:
Be the best in the leaderboard and get the highest score!
The more you kill enemies, the more you score.
And the more you are good, the more you level up and get the greatest weapons!

name: Square n Fair
summary: Relaxing puzzle platformer.

name: Squareface
summary:
A 3rd person action-RPG that puts you in full control of a miniature paper figurine set to solve the mystery of its existence. The game features complex character customization and weapons arsenal, base building, driving, accessory and ally management.
Paper-craft will be the main tool in exploring the giant world, because this is how a normal house appears to such a small creature.

name: Squeezone
summary:
Squeezone - it's pretty fabulous tower defence with shoot 'em up elements.
Prepare to protect the main tower: build structures, make sure to take a stand for yourself! In Squeezone you must directly support your protective buildings, conquer enemies as your character with complete freedom of action! Don’t forget to collect coins that falling from the mobs and upgrade defensive structures!

name: Square Arena
summary: Square Arena is a multiplayer arena game where each player controls a Ku-Bot and tries to defeat his opponent using one of the various weapons in the Arena. But the main characteristic of Square Arena is it's RANDOMNESS: Players will face random rule changes every 30 seconds.

name: Square's Route
summary: Square’s Route is the addictive new game of path finding and weed whacking.

name: Square Brawl
summary: A fast and skill based party game where all of the focus lies in fun and engaging gameplay.

name: Squarelands
summary: Squarelands is sandbox adventure game where you explore a randomly generated world while fighting, building and becoming stronger as you play! Mainly inspired by Terraria, Squarelands aims to provide plenty of freedom for the player.

name: Square Heroes
summary: Join the Galactic Tournament in this fast-paced comical action shooter. Level-up your Hero and unlock an arsenal of weapons. Lay waste to your friends and foes in local, LAN and online multiplayer matches, or hone your skills in single player and custom games.

name: Squirreltopia
summary: Squirrel-based Hardcore 2D Platformer. Save the Squirrel population from the evil robotic Squirrel, Shadowtail!

name: Squirm
summary: Race anound the hive collecting the eggs laid by the Queen. Avoid the worms who protect her and try to find 250 eggs before the lights go out.

name: Square Box
summary: Square Box: a game with the ball falling in a box.

name: Squirrel King
summary:
Squirrel King is an unlicensed platform game developed for the Sega Mega Drive. It was published and developed by Gamtec, and therefore its origin is Taiwan.

Squirrel King is extremely similar to Capcom's Chip 'N Dale: Rescue Rangers and it sequel, Chip 'N Dale: Rescue Rangers 2 for the NES, to the point where the player actually plays as two characters named "Chip" and "Dale" (though they look slightly different to their Disney counterparts). C jumps, B picks up and throws crates, and A allows Chip or Dale to throw fireballs, assuming they have some in their inventory.

Squirrel King is the basis for another unlicensed title, Super Mario World, also for the Mega Drive,but developed by Chuanpu and possibly published by Ming Super Chip Electronic.

name: Squids From Space
summary: Squids From Space is a team-based PvP top-down shooter where humans and the sinister Squid aliens wage war for the future of the Earth!

name: Squash
summary:
Squash lets players participate in squash matches playing against a computer opponent or with two players. The general rules are followed. The character can be steered around the court and two buttons are used: one for a hard shot and another for a light one. When hitting the ball the direction of the shot can also be determined. When a shot seems out of reach it is possible to perform a type of dive, but this has a recovery time usually long enough to miss the next shot when it returns. The players cannot collide or hinder each other.

There are eight characters to choose from, each from a different country. The first player to score nine points wins the game. A single credit is not necessarily sufficient to complete an entire game. After too many faults an additional credit is required to continue playing. When a serve takes too long a clock appears. Games consist of a series of matches against an opponent who becomes more difficult with each match.

name: Squish and the Corrupted Crystal
summary: Squish and the Corrupted Crystal is a fast paced sidescrolling platformer that features high speed mechanics, form switching and minor puzzle elements. The game focuses on collecting crystals to access new areas and the ability to overcome obstacles at high speeds by switching forms. Squish will feel familiar to fans of the old school platformers such as Mario, Sonic and Megaman.

name: Squadron: Sky Guardians
summary: The game is the story of three Iranian Air Force pilots combatting the enemy as part of simulated operations at three different time periods. The exact coordinates of all simulated settings and combats are accessible through aerial maps. In addition, the entire game setting has been designed using satellite maps.

name: Square Off
summary: Earth has been under attack for ages so a mad scientist creates a 4-player squadron of Square Avengers to save earth from the alien-spawning space ships and other threats using various firepower

name: Sqij!
summary: Shmup maze game about a bird of prey in a post-apocalyptic society. Best known for its broken ZX Spectrum port, which cannot be played.

name: Square x Square
summary:
About:
Square x Square is a local multiplayer game for 2 to 4 players.
There are 12 hats, 12 weapons and 12 abilities to be chosen, totalizing 1,728 possible combinations.
Every hat and weapon has a different status (attack, defense and speed) that directly interfere in their in-game status.
Your chosen ability has a passive effect that helps you in the game.
There are 3 different types of weapons: melee, short range and long range. Every type has a different playability. There are also weapons with special effects such as slowness, critical damage, and a weapon with a unique mechanic.
Every arena has loops on the sides (goes in through one side and comes out through the other).
Every arena spawns a box that generates random events for the match. These events can be good, bad or neutral.
There's a team mode to play 2x2.

name: Squarez Deluxe!
summary:
Squarez Deluxe! is a puzzle game similar to Tetris. Various shapes appear and can be moved with the mouse and placed on the playing field. When a 3x3 or larger grouping is created, it disappears and the player scores points. The game is over once the player can no longer place a new piece on the board.

There are three game modes: Basic, Normal, and Extreme. Basic has regular tiles only. The Normal mode is just like Basic except that some of the shapes contain special tiles. These tiles are activated when the square containing them disappears. Some tiles, like bombs and score multipliers, are helpful, while others, like spikes, should be left alone. In the Extreme mode there are a lot more of these special tiles.

Squarez Deluxe! also features a head to head mode. In this mode two players each have their own playing field, and certain special tiles activated by one player can affect the other. The player to last the longest wins.

name: Square Flood
summary: A puzzle game developed by Strategy Empire.

name: Squaredance
summary:
Join the colors and clear the field. 
One swipe moves the whole panel.

name: Squares
summary: Squares is a puzzle reflex game. The objective is to turn grey all the blue squares, while dealing with different kinds of squares before the time goes up. The game features 91 levels as well as a level editor for creating your own challenges.

name: Squibble: The Word Game
summary: Squibble is word-puzzle game for iOS and Android.

name: Sqrxz 4: Cold Cash
summary: The fourth entry in the Sqrxz remake series.

name: Sqrxz III
summary: Sqrxz must rescue his girlfriend from the forces of evil in this third outing from Retroguru.

name: Sqrxz 2
summary: Sqrxz 2 brings more bunny-hopping action to multiple platforms (and ditches those ridiculous exclamation points to boot).

name: !Sqrxz!
summary: !Sqrxz! is a 1996 platforming game starring an undefinable creature.

name: Square Head Zombies
summary: Square head zombies are everywhere. Grab your gun and shoot all the undeads.

name: Squareball
summary: Innovative puzzle platformer with old-school graphics and audio for the iPhone by Swedish developer Drömsynt.

name: Squid Yes! Not So Octopus!
summary: Born of atomic death! Raised in the shadow of a mushroom cloud! He's a squid! Not an Octopus! He's Squid Yes! Not So Octopus! And he's very irritable. A classic single player, psychedelic, retro styled, arena shooter. The aim of the game is to score as close to 9 as possible whilst not succumbing to the invading masses.

name: Squishy Tank
summary:
Squishy Tank is a quick paced tile-based puzzle game.
The tanks are put through various tasks by different drill sergeants. Published by Natsume.

name: Squash
summary: Squash is a variation of the classic paddle-game PONG where the players are supposed to hit the ball alternately against a wall.

name: Square Deal
summary: Square Deal (known as Cadillac II in Japan) is a card based poker variant game. It is the sequel to the Japanese only game Cadillac.

name: Square's Tom Sawyer
summary: Square's Tom Sawyer is a role-playing game based on Mark Twain's novel, The Adventures of Tom Sawyer. It lets players assume control of Tom Sawyer and his companions as they search for Injun Joe's treasure.

name: Squirmer the Game
summary: In Squirmer The Game you take control of a space ship in order to kill a centipede. Shooting at the head or tail of the centipede will shrink it while shooting in between will split into 2 centipedes.

name: Squareboy vs Bullies
summary: A retro-inspired brawler.

name: Squareboy vs Bullies: Arena Edition
summary: Squareboy vs Bullies is an old school beat 'em up by Rohan Narang that follows the titular Squareboy and his quest for Justice!

name: Squarism
summary: SQUARISM is a minimalist logic game about combining pieces scattered around into a perfect square. Complete all 70 lovely-crafted levels and become master of square assembling!

name: Square Massacre
summary: Square Massacre is a skill based, hardcore top-down shooter. No matter what you are going to do, you will lose. The question is how long you will last before the end.

name: Squid Yes! Not So Octopus! Squid Harder!
summary: Squid Yes! Not So Octopus! Squid Harder! is an arena shooter created by Robert D. Fearon. It was inspired by many other arena shooters.

name: Sqiek
summary: Similar to Skweek.

name: Squash Pipes
summary:
An endless arcade game, where you have to move forward avoiding getting hit by pipes. 
The more pipes you avoid, the more points you get! 
Collect coins and open the box with heroes to get one!

name: Squad 44
summary:
Formerly known as Post Scriptum, Squad 44 is the most authentic WW2 first-person shooter, featuring 20 large-scale battlefields, upwards of 80 realistic WW2 weapons, and over 50 true-to-life vehicles. You must prioritize communication, coordination, and teamwork to snatch victory from the jaws of defeat.

Experience real WW2 campaigns, such as the liberation of the Netherlands and the Battle of Normandy. The war stretched across the farms, villages, and cities of Europe, and whether you’re jumping out of a plane, arriving by sea, or storming the battlefield in a tank, you’ll need to group up with your squad before taking on the enemy.

name: Squares
summary: Squares is a puzzle game in which you have to put everything in its place. You need to arrange the colored squares from the initial position to the position marked with colored stars for each color of square, appropriately.

name: Squash Kings VR
summary: Squash Kings VR is aimed at realistic squash games using virtual reality systems. So that this game will be a more familiar and enjoyable opportunity for the proficient, and it will be a simulation for beginners to learn the real game.

name: Squidlit
summary: Every day is a wonderful day for invertebrates! Come join the Squidlits of Blipston for a squishy adventure of spoopy castles, muffins, and wiggles! Made with classic handheld technology in mind, Squidlit strives to be the closest modern recreation of GameBoy game-design methods on the market.

name: Squeakers
summary: Water is flooding the world. Build your own way to climd higher and higher. Maybe there is a chance of survival after all. Give yourself a try! Help those boars reach the highest level.

name: Squirm
summary:
After a previous adventure, you and your rat friend stop for a snooze. When you wake up, the rat is gone and strange creatures have appeared across the land as if from out of nowhere! What has happened while you were asleep? Where is your rat friend?
Get to the bottom of these mysteries by squirming your way through tons of trap-infested levels!

name: Squirrel Sphere
summary: RECREATIONAL RODENT ROLLING

name: Squarewave Maker
summary: Squarewave Maker is a sandbox rhythm action game where the level is your musical instrument. Alone or with friends you'll have to be a virtuoso to be the best. Create and share levels and music to become one of our community's most regarded maestros. Music is always just one jump away.

name: Squid Gurl and the Salty Sea Man
Squarehead
summary:
Squarehead is a pixelart-action-jump & run game set in a comic style.
You need to shoot, jump & teleport through more than 40 levels.
Search forests, caves, deserts and snowy landscapes,
to refuel your ship with diamonds.

name: Square Route
summary: Square Route is an classic puzzle game in which you modify the terrain by adding and removing platforms and placing tools to create a safe Route for the Squares to get to their targets. With 120 addictive levels!

name: Square Head Zombies 2 - FPS Game
summary: New zombies need to be defeated in Square Head Zombies 2. Go to new places, find and destroy them all.

name: Squidward Neighbor. Sponge Revenge of Bob
summary: Say Hello to Sponge neighbor Bob's Squidward! Supports 7 Languages! Enjoy it!

name: Squares
summary:
Simple game in wich you can entertain and relax yourself. 
Squares flying in many directions from you moves in new game mechanic. 
You should slide the squares by the path and dont touch others squares. 
Different levels and challenges is waiting for you in the game.

name: Squirgle
summary: A dazzling ballet of color, form and sound, Squirgle is a frenetic puzzle game.

name: Squid Survival Simulator: Sea Animal Life 3D
Squad Z
summary: Squad Z is a post-apocalyptic game of survival. Players from around the world battle in an immersive, breathtaking experience of diverse maps and game modes.

name: Squid Vs Vexus
summary: As the Sun starts to transform into a red giant, every planet, except Pluto, is joining forces to save the Solar System from certain demise. The Plutonians, feeling left behind and undermined, decide to send Squid, their strongest warrior, to finish off the 8 Emperors of the Solar System, that form Vexus. In his journey, Squid will find hordes of enemies in planets with technology much more advanced than his own. Will Squid exact revenge for his people? Only you can decide.

name: Square Shooter
summary: This is a minimalistic fast-paced shooter with a high level of difficulty

name: SquareWorld Unpixeled
summary: Explore a randomly generated universe full of unique planets! Build whatever comes into your mind with hundreds of blocks available! Mine for precious treasures and dungeons! Play alone or with friends, create or destroy, explore or build up a home. Choose your way of playing.

name: Squally
summary: Squally is a 2D puzzle RPG game that teaches video game hacking -- WITHOUT boring lessons, lectures, nor the need for prior experience. Instead, Squally teaches hacking through fun engaging puzzles where learning is a by-product.

name: Squishies
summary: Help stranded Squishies find their way back home in a fantastic miniature 3D universe! Squishies is a single player, puzzle platform experience, built exclusively for PlayStation VR. Solve puzzles and save Squishies, or be creative and build your own levels—then share them with the community!

name: Squish Machine
summary: Squish Machine is a platform game where you have to make your way through the single-screen level before the machine gets to you. Dodge enemies, evade tricky traps and solve simple puzzles to stop the machine before you are squished to oblivion!

name: Squadron II
summary:
Battle ruthless enemies on a frantic pace in this shoot'em up game that will put your reflexes to the test ! 
 
Cross the galaxy and push back the enemy threat in epic interstellar battles. Progress in an effervescent world with breathtaking graphics where shooting never ends! 
 
Rush through the stars on ultra-rhythmic retro-futuristic synthwave music. As you dodge endless bullets in a magnetic and intense atmosphere, brave the waves of enemies and complete your mission! 
 
Roam unique planets infested with fierce hybrid enemies. Assemble a squad of legendary ships and battle tough and unpredictable bosses! 
 
Squadron 2 is a pure shot of adrenaline that will put your nerves and your agility to the test!

name: Sqvishy
summary:
Guide towering, tumbling fishtanks toward matching exit tiles in an increasingly frantic fever-dream of puss-based-puzzling. Six levels of difficulty, customizable colors, cosmic rainbows!

Originally designed as a virtual arcade machine minigame inside Big Robot's "The Light Keeps Us Safe", this standalone version of Sqvishy is expanded and improved. Guide towering, tumbling fish tanks toward matching exit tiles in an increasingly frantic fever-dream of puss-based-puzzling.

name: Sqr 4
summary: Sqr 4 is a colourful mathematical puzzle. The player's point is to make each line's digit sum equal to appropriate column's sum using addition (+), substraction (-), multiplication (×), division (÷), squaring (^), square root extraction operation (√), concatenation (∨) and clipping (∧) only.

name: Square Norm
summary: Stop being a SQUARE! Become a CIRCLE! Norm needs to GAIN SIDES to become ROUNDER. Guide Norm from WORLD TO WORLD, and BOSS TO BOSS, gaining SIDES along the way! With each boss Norm defeats, a NEW SIDE will be added to his shape, and with it, a NEW POWER!

name: Square Weapons Dungeon
summary: Roguelike-ish Action Game/180 Weapons in total. The dungeon floors are chosen randomly from more than 100 stages. Collect the lost Weapons and challenge the Bosses. You will lose your Level and Weapons when you get defeated in the dungeon.

name: Squirrel & Bär: Learn English
summary:
Squirrel & Bär is an adventure game for 3-9-year-old kids to learn English as a foreign language on mobile phones and tablets.

Join Squirrel & Bär on a journey to save the bees, seeking for a magic flower. Starting in the forest, the players have 22 levels to beat. Passing through five different worlds various animals are there to help the players out. At the end the lynx awaits the players, but she only speaks English! Good, that Squirrel & Bär did accquire the neccessary words and sentences to ask the lynx for help!

name: Squirrel Jump
summary: Play as the Squirrel in this endless running 2D game. Filled with excitement and fun, this game will entertain you a lot. Run, dash, and jump your way through the forest, waterfalls, caves and other challenging terrains! The best endless runner game! Unlock your favorite Squirrel and get ready to run.

name: Squarcat
summary:
High in the sky, mysterious lands hover. There lives a Squarecat and adventure begin here!
Your task is to reach the finish line by solving different puzzles.

-The game is expanded on two screens.
-Cute, simple graphics.
-The game has a soothing atmosphere.

name: Squidgies Takeover
summary: You control the Squidgies, hapless little blobs of adorableness, that need your help to escape their Momma's tentacles and make their new home on planets across the galaxy.

name: Square Farm
summary: You are a farm manager. Your job is to manage your field well, take care of your plants, hire farmers to help and of course sell ready products with profit!

name: Squillamorph
summary: Squillamorph is a challenging action-platformer set in a mysterious mechanical world. Pursued by hordes of brutal enemies, you must use your parasitic ability to 'infest' and take control of them. Fight back, survive, and you might just discover your purpose.

name: Squares
summary: Squares is a relaxed multi player game with out any combat and can be played by anyone of any age... meant for 2 or more players

name: Squirrel Forest
summary: Deforestation is an apocalypse for squirrels. Only a few trees are left standing. Squirrels are put in danger and forced to act. Two brothers Zen and Ven decide to restore harmony in the forest by uniting fellow survivors and embarking on a journey to replant the forest. They need you to help them!

name: Square Fast
summary: Square Fast is a fast-paced hardcore rhythm arcade with chiptune soundtrack by Balloonbear, where you have to defeat different enemies using only 2 buttons.It focuses on putting player into "flow state", where you don't think and only rely on your reflexes to do the job.

name: Squatch
summary: Squatch is a puzzle game in which you attempt to connect all squares in a scene by color matching their sides.

name: sQuiz
summary: An online quiz website, with public and private rooms, various themes and several difficulties.

name: Squishy Sports
summary: Squishy Sports is a bonkers 2D party game where the characters are SHAPES and everything is SQUISHY! Squishy Sports smashes the visuals of Saturday morning cartoons with addictive, local-multiplayer gameplay! Players compete against each other in tons of epic sports modes, with a pickup and play control system so the whole family can get involved!

name: Square Dancer
summary:
Square Dancer is a basic pinball simulation for MSX.

The player controls the left and right paddle individually, and attempts to keep the pinball in play for as long as possible with the goal to maximize score.

name: Squad 51 vs. the Flying Saucers
summary: UFOs! Aliens! Aircrafts! Resistance! SHOOT 'EM UP! Squad 51 vs. the Flying Saucers is a spaceship shooter with 2D gameplay and 3D environment. Enjoy a smart combination of a fast-paced shooting experience and the 1950's sci-fi movies aesthetic, with live-action cutscenes.

name: SquaresStory
summary: You were living happily with your wife. Suddenly one day, an octopus flew down from the sky and rolled away her. Sart your adventure to save your wife.

name: Squad Killer
summary:
Recalling the straightforward and addictive challenge of 8-bit classics, Squad Killer puts you in control of a retro arcade experience with a little modern flair. Graphics are presented in pixelated two-tone style but offer a touch of detail, customization and precision that pushes beyond the limits of its inspirations. Adjust the color palette, choose between multiple play modes, purchase upgrades and overcome unpredictably shuffled stage order with each run!

The objective is simple – clear all enemies from the rooms you enter, obtain a key and proceed to the next level. But victory is far from certain as new types of enemies aim to end your run and a boss encounter awaits every five stages. Kill or be killed! Take each one down quickly and strategically to collect coins and buy power-ups to stack the deck in your favor.

name: Squish
summary: Squish is a Multi Screen Game & Watch video game released in 1986 by Nintendo. The game was never released in Japan. A Pocketsize version of the game was also released. The unit's model number was MG-61. In the game, you have to avoid the platforms that are coming towards the player character, Ziggy the Mazeman. The game's name comes from the fact that you'll be "squished" if a platform hits you. The top screen contained game information, while all of the action took place on the bottom screen. This and Zelda were the only two games to have a format like this when it came to multi-screen games.

name: Squeaky Clean
summary: Squeaky Clean is an indie horror game set in the shower. Experience the fate of those who come across the urban legend known as the Shower Slasher as you enjoy some hot shower tunes.

name: Squeakers II
summary: Water is flooding the world. Build your own way to climb higher and higher. Maybe there is a chance of survival after all. Give yourself a try! Help those boars reach the highest level.

name: Squareometry
summary: Squareometry is a game that you control geometry shapes to pass levels with different kind of obstacles. Switch between figures, teleport, and reach the end of the game.

name: Squares Rage
summary: Have you ever played a game that is so fun, but is also so infuriating that you wanted to throw your keyboard against the wall? Squares Rage is one of those. You have been warned.

name: Squabble
summary: Choose your favourite sibling character and own others in-game. Attack your opponents or play defensively, use the environment to your advantage. Trap your opponents or just get rid of them in the old-fashioned way. Be mindful of your surrounding as the world around you changes and reveals its not-so-friendly face. You can play in a party of 4 players in the local multiplayer and fight for the ultimate victory. Game characters are children siblings fighting each other as they always do using any means necessary - exploding pillows, water guns, by unleashing monsters and also with the worst thing ever - their homework. The desire to win is great, following squabble is even greater. Let's dive into atmosphere of pixel art couch playstyle. With your skill growing there comes even bigger passion for win. Explore vivid rooms, extremely dangerous and be ready to squabble!

name: Squad of Dangerous
summary: War is going on. Go on 2d action missions, collect resources, cooperate with friends, send supplies to the frontline and watch the global war progress on the world map. Together, we'll get back our homeland!

name: Square vs Triangles
summary: Square vs Triangles is a old school 2D platformer with a minimalistic and beautiful art style and challenging gameplay mechanics inspired by 90's classics.

name: Squirrelmageddon!
summary: Squirrelmageddon! is an experimental satyric dark comedy of an impossible future. Genetically engineered Squirrels have overrun the planet. You are a soldier in the fight to reclaim the earth and prevent the extinction of all humankind.

name: Square Off
summary: Square Off is a fast-paced, platforming shooter arena. Control physics-based battle squares in a series of speedy combat challenges while you shoot your friends into oblivion and blow the world to bits while you're at it!

name: Squirrel Divorce
summary: Squirrel Divorce is a top down game where you control a squirrel and dodge the moles that crawl out of their holes, and also run away from annoying ex-wives and collect scattered luggage around the location. Each time one of the wives steals your truck and you have to catch up with a heavy truck.

name: Squingle
summary: The spiraling psychedelic puzzle – Grab revolving orbs and guide them through twisting liquid crystal mazes to create the Universe! A refreshing, relaxing and satisfying "one more go" experience, only in VR.

name: Square Game
summary: Test your thinking an strategy skills in a remake of the classic Puzzle-Game Microsoft Russian Square Plus! Edition

name: Squaxel
summary: Discover, build, destroy, take a walk on flying islands ! That's only one part from all the things that the game can give you !

name: Square vs Triangles
summary: Square Vs Triangles is a fast-action shooter game where your objective is to defeat all the triangles and bosses of each level. There are multiple types of bosses and enemies that you can defeat one by one or use your special abilities and kill more than one at once. Quick reflexes, intelligence and a winner mindset can make you the one to save the squares!

name: Squidward's Suicide
summary: An unknown character wakes up to find himself fast asleep. He sooner discovers himself in the SpongeBob universe but something is wrong. Squidward is not himself & you must continue on going through trials. Do what he says.

name: Sqr 2
summary: Sqr 2 is logical platformer with hardcore elements. It contains 3 difficulty and 100+ levels with different gameplay on each level. The simple controls & many mechanics with logical problems make game process more interesting.

name: Sqwark! A Nutty Adventure
summary: Sqwark is just your average Green parrot who lives at 85 Acorn Drive. But when some multidimensional beings show up and attempt to take every delicious nut in the world to use as fuel for their weird and wonderful contraptions, he has to do something about it.

name: Squares Rage: Character - Crying Chris
summary: Play as him through your Squares Rage levels to try and get him to stop crying.

name: Squad: Canadian Armed Forces
summary: A new battlefield for SquadThe Canadian Armed Forces DLC is free for all owners of Squad and is an all new faction developed by community members together with Offworld Industries. Featuring two new maps on the North American continent, three new vehicles and completely custom and hand crafted character models it will add a complete new...

name: Squadron
summary: A jet-fighting arcade game by Sega.

name: Squared Up
summary: Join Cubert, a 3rd dimensional shape, on his quest to escape the 2nd dimension. Navigate puzzles by morphing Cubert's form and interacting with the world to escape back to the 3rd dimension.

name: Squirm: Pocket Squirm
summary: Something terrible has happened in the land of 'Squimlia'. Reality is shifting and some real spooky stuff is going on. Your rat friend, Crackers, has been blown to the top of a tower. Go save him!

name: Squirix
summary: Squirix is a minimalistic logic puzzle game with handmade challenges where you have to colorize all hexagons to complete each puzzle.

name: Squeaky Squirrel
summary: Join Squeaky one single squirrel that took it upon himself to protect his homeland from the evil machines trying to destroy the beautiful green and peaceful forrest.

name: Square Dungeon
summary: Square Dungeon is a word independent game of dungeon exploration. "Amnesiacs" wake up in an ancient "dungeon". The only way to find their identity and memory is to go to a higher dungeon. In the process, they should make choices and grasp their own destiny.

name: Squidoku
summary: A first-of-its-kind SUDOKU adventure game featuring the gang from EverythingHerbs, two separate story lines, and at least one super villain.

name: Squad Battles: Grenada
summary: Operation Urgent Fury opened on October 25th, 1983. The United States, heeding the request of the Organisation of Eastern Caribbean States, chose to intervene to both restore order, but also to stymie the growing influence of the Cubans in the Caribbean. This demo game is intended to showcase many of the attributes of the Squad Battles system.

name: Squatzee
summary: The Game where getting squat is a good thing!

name: Square Up
summary: the squares sure do jump and maybe even do gravity things too

name: Squid Game: The Game
summary:
Squid Game: The Game is a survival horror game based on the popular Netflix thriller ‘Squid Game’. Compete among a crowd in a number of games direct from the show to see if you have what it takes to survive.

You meet a man in the subway offering vast riches and exorbitant amounts of money. All you have to do is play a few simple games. Sounds like child's play... right?

name: Squeek, the meek
summary: An updated version of my Gameboy Jam entry.

name: Square Word: Christmas Edition
summary: Help Santa’s cats to organize Christmas!

name: Square Worlds
summary: A simple tile-placement puzzler

name: Squad Battles: First World War
summary: Squad Battles: First World War allows you to experience the technical and tactical advancements of that conflict, and the terrible battles that were carried out. Can you survive the horrific campaigns of the First World War?

name: Sqroma
summary:
Sqroma is a puzzle game where you have to dodge the colored enemies to reach the end. You'll be able to make the enemies kill themself or become yourself colored and pass through them and their shots.
The levels do not restart after each death, use it as an advantage to create a path using your own body to block annoying shots.

name: Squad Battles: Pacific War
summary:
Squad-level wargame set in WW2 Pacific Theater. From Nomonhan in Russia to the jungles of Burma, Pacific War enables you to replay the history of World War II in the Pacific.
60 scenarios covering the entire Pacific Theater in World War II involving forces from the Chinese (both Nationalist and Communist), Dutch, Soviet, Australian, British, US, and the Japanese.
3 campaigns allow you to play the role of a commander during the war in the Pacific as either Australian, American, or Japanese.

name: Squad Battles: The Proud and the Few
summary:
Squad-level wargame set in WW2 Pacific Theater that focuses on the battles of the United States Marines against the forces of Japan. Relive those glorious moments of the Marine history in their victorious advance from one island to another. From Guadalcanal to Okinawa, and even to the shores of the Japanese home islands, join the fight to ultimate victory.
The Proud and the Few includes 46 Scenarios, including Wake Island, Tarawa, Guadalcanal, Iwo Jima, and others, covering all sizes and situations.

Included are 23 unique maps ranging in size from 390 hexes to 77,028 hexes, covering many of the island hopping operations in the Pacific theater.

The Order of Battles include US Army, US Marine, Japanese Army and Japanese Naval soldiers.

Unit component, Order-of-Battle and Scenario Editors which allow players to customize the game.

Map & Sub-map editors allowing map creation and any of the included maps to be "chopped" up into smaller segments for custom scenario creation.

The Proud and the Few provides multiple play options including play against the computer AI, Play by E-mail (PBEM), LAN & Internet "live" play, and two player hot seat.

name: Squabble
summary: A word game that pits you against your friends in a rapid-fire guessing match. Play against up to 99 other people and be the last standing.

name: SquareMan-Boy
summary: A neon style puzzle platformer where you constantly bounce around from block to block. Avoid lasers by using your dash, world rotators and teleporters to your advantage.

name: SquareMan
summary: SquareMan has fallen off a cliff and into a the Caverns of Squared. Attain willpower and escape via the bridge atop the mountain in SquareMan, a punishing 2D precision platformer. Beware the spikes and slopes that may either break or make your spirit in this dangerous journey.

name: Squarena
summary: Squarena is a skill-based party game with an emphasis on physics combat. The game mechanics support ease of entry with a high skill ceiling. Have you ever wanted to prove to your friends who the best colorfully decorated square combatant is? If so, this is the game for you!

name: Squarewood Farm
summary: A relaxing and addictive farm-themed block puzzler. Harvest crops by forming rows, columns or squares with strangely shaped seeds. Use the profits from your vegetables to purchase tools, buy animals, or expand your humble farm.

name: Squid Run
summary: An old child's game with new killing rules! Run while nobody sees, stay while you are being watched!

name: Sqdef
summary:
Sqdef is a tower defense game for the GP2X handhelds. The goal is to prevent enemies from getting from one side of the map to the other by placing towers along their way. There are over a dozen different buildings with upgrades, tech research, and a whole lot of maps! There's also a built-in editor so you can make your own maps and share them with others.

Sqdef won 1st place at the GBAX 2007 Coding Competition and is a GP2X Wiz built-in game.

name: Squirdle
summary: A Pokémon-themed guessing game where players aim to guess a mystery Pokémon based on its release generation, typing, height, and weight. Includes both a daily and unlimited mode.

name: Squardle
summary: A daily word guessing game, where the player's goal is to solve a 5x5 grid with 6 hidden words. Each guess reveals information about the location of the letters contained in the guess in the rest of the puzzle.

name: Square
summary: Survive as long as you can in a procedurally generated world of Square. The only weapon you have is the jump button and your brain. Plan fast and execute your strategy even faster. Mix your reflex and brain power to survive.

name: Square Word: Summer Edition
summary: Square Word is coming on Steam for PC, Mac & Linux! Find all the 100+ words spread in 10 sunny categories! Complete objectives & collect post cards!

name: Square Knight
summary: A classic platform game, with obstacles, enemies, boss fights, BUT you can level up, jump higher, run faster, and be infinitely stronger.

name: Squirrels: Doomed City
summary: Squirrels: doomed city is an exciting RPG set in the city of N, the main inhabitants of which are squirrels.. Explore the open world, go through the plot and unravel what secrets the doomed city holds

name: Squirrels are going nuts
summary: A grid based action blast em up with single player and local multiplayer party mode for 1-4 players.

name: Squamations
summary: Squamations is a relaxing yet fast paced word game you can play at your own speed!

name: Square Runner
summary:
Square Runner is a fast-paced platformer where you try to go back to your home planet with the side effect of saving earth.
Will you return home or will you be stuck on earth forever? Form a squad, explore the unknown Adamian archipelago and fight creatures in Square Runner

name: Squid Prison
summary: It seems that the exit is already close... but all the time you find yourself in the same room with new riddles, losing hope that you can get out of here.

name: Squish
summary: A spoopy, squishy, and fast-paced party game where you and up to three gooey friends rave it up in an underground crypt as it collapses down on you. You must push blocks, dodge, and jump to survive the rave and squish your opponents. Last Skelegoo standing takes it all!

name: Square Valley
summary:
You play as the Spirit of the Valley, tasked with creating unique lands that meet the needs of the citizens. To achieve this, you will need to place tiles such as houses, trees, farms, animals, and much more! Each tile you position is unique in its characteristics and will be scored accordingly. You'll also create roads, rivers, fences, and more to connect all your tiles together in a meaningful way.
However, your task is not as simple as it sounds. You have limited control over which tiles you can place where. Each round will feel like a new challenge, so you'll have to plan ahead to succeed.

name: Squarely Blue
summary: A minimalist puzzle game in which you try to make your way through each level by finding a path on a grid of tiles that disappear as soon as you leave them.

name: Square Keeper
summary: Square Keeper is a puzzle game, based on a card system, where each card gives the player the possibility to execute different actions, like a sword swing, shooting with a bow or simply walking.

name: Square Journey
summary: Square Journey is a minimalist arcade game that aims to help Square reach the depths of his inner dungeon in search of a greater understanding of himself.

name: SquadBlast
summary: In 2041, citizens worldwide take up arms to fight oppressive dictators and corporations to rebuild the crumbling world.

name: Squish
summary: A spoopy, squishy, and fast-paced party game where you and up to three gooey friends rave it up in an underground crypt as it collapses down on you. You must push blocks, dodge, and jump to survive the rave and squish your opponents.

name: Square
summary: Launch. Recall. Avoid.

name: SquishCraft
summary: Squish blocks together to solve challenging puzzles.

name: Squeen's Adventure
summary: After Squeen's beloved spaceship suffers a oil leak, Squeen loses control and crash lands onto Earth. Now while that wouldn't be so bad on its own, Squeen also realizes that his phone's battery is low! Help Squeen in finding parts to repair his ship so he can get back to his home planet and charge his phone!

name: Squeen's Adventure: Alien Edition
summary:
Squeen's spaceship has crash-landed onto earth, now that wouldn't be so bad, but his phone is dying and he needs to get to a charger quick! Help our alien pal in getting a brand new ship and getting back to his home planet.

Squeen's Adventure: Alien Edition is a remaster of the original Squeen's Adventure, as such it comes with new and improved sounds, graphics, quality of life changes, and runs at a higher framerate.

name: Squeen's Adventure 2: Crash on Mars
summary: Now that Squeen has built his space ship, he can get back to his home planet! However, Squeen forgot that spaceships still run on engines. As such when leaving earth, he crashes into the surface of Mars. Help our alien pal, Squeen scrounge up some parts of an engine so he can charge his phone and get back to his home planet!

name: Squirrel with a Gun
summary: Squirrel, meet gun. As the neighborhood’s most obnoxious rodent, develop a knack (and a love?) for crime and mayhem in pursuit of golden acorns in this nutty sandbox shooter and puzzle platformer. Fight tooth, claw, and gun to escape a secret underground facility and defeat the Agents.

name: Squaredle
summary: Squaredle is a daily word finding game. Form words in a 4x4 grid by connecting letters up, down, left, right and diagonally. New puzzle every day, with harder puzzles later in the week. Includes leaderboards and special larger puzzles.

name: Squids: Battle Arena
summary: Blast, dodge and survive in fully destructible arenas against 2-4 friends. Collect 100+ power ups with weapons and abilities to shrink your enemies to bits while growing to become the last squid standing!

name: Square It: An Electronic Game of Capture the Boxes
Square Rounds
summary: Square Round's is a Shooter Survival Round based game. Can you survive all 350 rounds? If you can, you shall be compared to a Legend. Game difficulty increases. Saves your High score and High Round to try to beat your own records. There is a Armor and Health system.

name: Square Off
summary: Square Off is a mayhem filled local party arena brawler where you must roll to move, move to aim, and aim to win by battling it out with up to 3 of your friends in short-chaos filled matches.

name: Squirmunity: Ballad of the prankmonger
summary: Squirmunity is a game detailing the multi-faceted adventures of Cubicle the Cube.

name: Squid Fighter
summary: This is a single/multiplayer swording shooting and fighting arena. You and your friends are invited to take participate in. People are divided into different 4 team, using your intelligence and action to get to know "who will survive?".

name: Squirrel Away
summary: Squirrel Away is a handcrafted precision 2D platformer where you step up to help a squirrel couple to find acorn treasures from the mystery island based on a fable world. You have to be fast and precise while carrying acorns to the stump with the fear of time is finished.

name: Sqube Darkness
summary: A unique endless running game. Only 1% of the racers reached 5000 meters!

name: Squid! Escape! Fight!
summary: Swim under the sea with this hungry cephalopod and meet the other marine dwellers in this straight forward arcade adventure.

name: Squirrel Launcher
summary: Launch squirrels into the atmosphere and explore the clouds. Dodge and shoot down obstacles – upgrade your vehicle to make it further and further until you get to the moon!

name: Square Life
summary: Why do you need the company of beautiful women to do a simple thing?

name: Squitter's Spider Quest
summary:
Every level is now played with Squitter!

Levels have had their objects rearranged to make sure Squitter can get through them safely.

name: Squiggle Drop
summary:
Solve puzzles by drawing a single shape.

Featuring 100 levels, each with a unique objective and requiring different types of problem solving skills.

name: Squad Busters
summary: Build a vast collection of Supercell characters, each bringing their own special ability to the battle. Wrestle enemies with Brawl Stars' El Primo, or spray bullets with Boom Beach's Heavy. Harvest Trees with Hay Day's Greg, or summon Skeletons with Clash's Witch!

name: Square Garden
summary: This is an easy and simple building game. Build your own garden.

name: Squared
summary: A small grid-based puzzle game where you take control of a square. Move around the blocks and walls, change gravity and overcome obstacles to reach the Exit Portal.

name: Squid on Road
summary: You're a squid who owns a car with a grappling hook. The road is full of bandits.

name: Squirrel and Nuts
summary: The squirrel is about to go for the winter. To do this, she needs to find a new home and collect the required number of nuts. Help the squirrels with this. You are going on a big trip.

name: Squares & Fruit
summary: Squares & Fruit comes in two playing modes. While both modes reward the efficient player, to get a high score, each demands a different strategy. For instance, Classic mode players should conserve moves for the next round; Challenge mode players should match the edges to get higher scores.

name: Squared: Adjacent Stones
summary: In this Puzzle / Logic game you need to convert enough stones from the field to win the level. The amount of necessary stones will vary and there is an AI Opponent who will try to out-play you. You can only move in straight lines from stones that you already control. Stones that you move over, will fall into your control.

name: Squeen's Adventure 3: Across The Cosmos
summary:
The "threequal" (Is that a word?) to one of the best games known to man! (Don't look that up)

​After finally completing his adventure, Squeen's spaceship is fully working without any problems! That is until a rouge asteroid knocks into his ship and his Light-Jump Reactor breaks off and plunges into a nearby black hole. With no way to get back home, Squeen must travel across the universe in search of the parts of the reactor, fix it, and finally go home and charge his phone!

name: Squares and Numbers
summary: A beginner friendly abstract nonogram puzzle game.

name: Squad Game
summary: Squad Game is a unique game that combines side-scrolling adventure with quarter-view turn-based strategic battles.

name: Squad Tactics
summary: Deep strategy turn-based tactical combat with highly customizable squads. Single-Player roguelike and competitive PvP

name: Square Enix AI Tech Preview: The Portopia Serial Murder Case
summary: This software is an educational demonstration of Natural Language Processing (NLP), an AI technology, as applied to the adventure game “The Portopia Serial Murder Case” (created by Yuji Horii and first published in Japan in 1983). At the time of the game’s original release, most adventure games were played using a “command input” system, where the player was asked to type in text to decide the actions of their character. Free text input systems like these allowed players to feel a great deal of freedom. However, they did come with one common source of frustration: players knowing what action they wanted to perform but being unable to do so because they could not find the right wording. This problem was caused by the limitations of PC performance and NLP technology of the time.

name: Square Wave
summary: Square wave is an Arcade game inspired from the old classics. Push Away the Squares before they pass through the arena, And Survive for as long as you can and Get The Highest Score.

name: Square Brain
summary: In this fast-paced puzzle game, rearrange squares of different colors, as quickly as you can, to match the winning arrangement. Do so with as large a grid as you can.

name: Squid Grid
summary: Welcome to Squid Grid! A free puzzle challenge about a squid on a grid. Unique sokoban mechanics, cute art, and hand-crafted levels will give you a puzzle experience you won't forget. Get Squid Griddin'!

name: Squish Run
summary: Welcome to the Squish Run! Are you quick enough to punch and run your way to the goal before a pointy wall of doom ends your day?

name: Sqwrk
summary: Fast paced 3d platformer with momentum based movement

name: Square Inertia
summary: Try to set the fastest times possible in Square Inertia: a fast-paced, momentum-based precision platformer. Race against the clock to improve your own personal best times and beat the author times set for each level.

name: Square & Line
summary:
Dare your dexterity and skill with this free game. Clear different obstacles and achieve the highest score. How far can you go?
Touch drag on screen to move square avoid paths.

name: Squishys Revenge
summary:
Oh no! Dr. Spudget has stolen all the squishberries. Squishy needs your help to get revenge! Help Squishy get the squishberries back and save all his squishling friends.   
Squishy's Revenge takes classic sliding tile puzzles to new heights! Move the world under Squishy's feet and save the Squishberries!

name: Squid Girl World Ep.0
summary:
After crash landing on a planet covered in mushrooms, Aseroe meets a squid girl named Sepia..

This is the first visual novel in Squid Girl World.

name: Squeeks: Trickshot Festival
summary: Squeeks: Trickshot Festival is a cutesy physics puzzle game where you have to deliver to the destination as many adorable little chickens as possible. One more thing, Squeeks love to clump up, so what are you waiting for - let’s get rolling!

name: Squeebing Up the Tower of Friendship
summary: Can you make it to the top of the Tower of Friendship? Run, jump, climb, fall, and then do it all again. Play by yourself or with your friends. Be nice and reach out a hand to help each other up, or push each other off when the falls are the highest. But whatever you do, never stop squeebing.

name: Squidding Over It
summary: Get as high as you can with this slippery and clumsy squid. But be careful that if you stumble you may slip back to where you started!!

name: SquirrelWarz
summary: SquirrelWarz is a handcrafterd real time strategy mixed with casual game-play.

name: Square Dungeon 2
summary: "Square Dungeon 2" is a dungeon exploration + roguelite text-based indie game. The demon king left a prophecy to the human king before death that the warriors would betray him when the Armageddon came. As a warrior, what will you choose on the Armageddon?

name: Squiigee
summary: Use your momentum to swing, launch and fly, cleaning cityscapes in record time to earn some sweet, sweet cash!

name: Squares and Stuff
summary: Build, experiment, and share in Squares and Stuff, a pixel-retro sandbox game inspired by classic "falling sand" games. Unleash your creativity in an open-ended world filled with sandbox elements like water, paint, fire, sand, animals, humans, zombies, and a controllable 2D platform character.

name: Squab
summary: Squab is a young pigeon who woke up in a cage, but his father Maximus had disappeared, leaving only a red cap behind. Find out how to save Maximus by overcoming unimaginable challenges in this thrilling and exciting adventure.

name: Square Word: Back to Work
summary: Square Word is coming on Steam! Discover 100+ words spread in 4 chill themes! Handcrafted grids, hints, mini-objectives & more!

name: Squonker 3
summary: Squonker 3 is an 8 map megawad for Doom 2 and one of the most anticipated sequels in all of doom wads, featuring breathtaking visuals and hyper polished gameplay.

name: Squares
summary: Squares is a single-level PWAD for Doom II by Costa Lappas, released in March 1995. It was significant for having a very high monster count at this early stage of the Doom modding scene. Some consider it the first slaughter map.

name: Squirrel vs. Worms
summary: The life of a squirrel is simple. Constant fun in the park ending in nut feast, but only untill the worms invasion occur. The vicious worms want to deprive the squirrel of its food. Help the squirrel in its struggle with its eternal enemies - worms. Defend squirrel against hordes of worms trying to take possesion of its supplies. Check how your friends managed in this battle.

name: Squarez: Escape The Squares
summary: Don’t touch a square. Click around your screen and the ball will move.

name: Squirrel Stapler
summary:
Originally created as part of The Dread X Collection II, Squirrel Stapler is a horror hunting simulator that satirizes low budget edutainment games with pitch black humor and panic-inducing absurdist horror.

A lonely man living in a remote cabin wakes up one day and realizes his beloved--a dismembered corpse nailed to the cabin wall--has been made ugly and rotten by the flies that swarm her. He wishes she were beautiful, like the squirrels of the wood. And so he sets out to hunt the squirrels of the wood, so that he might staple them to her and make her beautiful again.

But that is easier said than done. A sinister presence lurks in the deep forest, and it has only one rule: "Thou shalt not staple squirrels!"

name: Squid Squabble
summary: Squid Squabble is a high-octane arena shooter where players fight over limited ink that allows them to respawn. Face off with 2-8 players online or locally, collecting single-use items to outplay your enemies and be the last team standing.

name: Square City Builder
summary: Build the small pixel city of your dreams! From classic city-building games, Square City Builder offers various ways to customize your gameplay, from constructing houses, farms, or roads to facing random events. In this game, you're in control!

name: Squeaky Squad
summary: The Squeaky Squad struck again! Fight an army of rodents in this roguelite platformer.

name: Square Edges
summary: Mini arcade game about a cube jumping on moving platforms. All platforms move at different speeds. Find the right moment to make a precise jump so as not to fall off the edge. Collect tokens and gain a high rating to purchase other characters.

name: Square Word: Hello Winter!
summary: Square Word is coming on Steam! Discover 140+ words spread in 4 chill themes! Handcrafted grids, hints, mini-objectives & more!

name: Square Logic
summary: Square Logic is a minimalist puzzle game about coloring the grid with squares and rectangles, respecting the number of each cell.

name: Squid Commando
summary: Squid Commando is an action-packed, classic arcade run & gun game that can be played solo or in co-op.

name: Squire of Time
summary: Episode with eight mostly small oldschool levels including a start map, each in various classic Quake themes. It comes with custom music tracks by Alientale.

name: SQP Run
summary:
Take control of one of 8 unique characters and embark on a frantic race where speed and reflexes are king!

Your goal: cover as many meters as possible by skilfully avoiding obstacles in your way with the help of jumps and slides. As your score increases, the speed of the game accelerates, making each new challenge more intense.

If you're feeling cornered, quickly grab an energy drink for a life-saving burst of speed. But be careful, one wrong move and you're done!

Prove you're the fastest by checking the global leaderboard or challenging your friends directly. Who will be able to run farther than the others?

It's up to you to play the virtuosos of speed! A frenzied Runner where the pace is king and each new game is even more addictive. Ready to challenge your limits

name: Square Meal
summary: Eat and spit blocks, monsters and food in this co-op dungeon adventure.

name: Squirrel Day
summary: Squirrel Day is a non-violent VR platforming game that lets you climb, explore, and collect nuts through the eyes of a squirrel using an intuitive, physics-based movement system.

name: Squirrel Jump: Forest Pathway
summary: "Squirrel Jump - Forest Pathway" takes you on a charming adventure through 30 levels of vibrant forest puzzles. Leap through platforms, skillfully timing your jumps to reach the cozy Squirrel House. Immerse yourself in this engaging game, guiding the squirrel to its treetop haven!

name: Squoosh
summary: Squoosh is an unfinished prototype of an action game from Apollo. From it's appearance, it seems to have something to do with smashing grapes with a giant press.

name: Squirrel Legacy II: Children of the Nut
summary: Bob is just trying to save the world from the vile Omnicorp with the help of the mysterious Evergreen group. But his childhood friends keep bothering him! It's like they don't understand what is really important in life.​

name: Squid Guys
summary: Squid Guys is a Third-Person Multiplayer game. You play through several different deadly challenges based on children's games. The game continues until the last player stands.

name: Square Enix Masterpieces: Tomb Raider Bundle
summary:
This compilation bundles 4 games in the Tomb Raider series:
- Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness
- Tomb Raider: Legend
- Tomb Raider: Underworld
- Tomb Raider: Anniversary

name: Squeen's Adventure: Definitive Edition
summary:
A complete remake of the best game ever made! (don't look that up)

After Squeen's beloved spaceship suffers an oil leak, his ship loses control and crash lands onto the planet of Earth. Now while that wouldn't be so bad on its own, Squeen also realizes that his phone's battery is dangerously low! Help Squeen in finding parts all around the globe to repair his ship so he can get back to his home planet and charge his phone!

Remade from the ground up in the same engine that brought Squeen's Adventure 2 & 3 to life, Squeen's Adventure: Definitive Edition is a complete remake of the original Squeen's Adventure. Featuring brand new original assets, brand new sound effects, complete level remakes and reworks, a full achievement system, an original soundtrack, and a whole bunch more, this is the absolute definitive way to play a Jupitr Entertainment classic!

name: Squirrels Gone Nuts
summary: Squirrels Gone Nuts is a fast-paced, multiplayer, arena shooter. Play as a speedy squirrel able to run on any surface and wield various guns. Procedurally generated arenas paired with an innovative game mode that blends capture the flag with king of the hill ensures a fresh experience every match.

name: Squad: Weapon Skins - Jungle Assault Pack
summary: Weapon skins are cosmetic items grounded in reality that don't impact gameplay.

name: Squirmish: The Videogame of Brawling Beasties
summary: Squirmish is a hilarious turn-based card-battling game for online PVP or solo play. Find your favorite creature cards and battle them against your opponent's beastie brigade. Strange strategies and interactions of the wildly-varying cards create a unique, unpredictable and infinitely-playable game!

name: Squigley
summary: Traverse and experience a massive, cohesive 2D world as Squigley. Use your wits, resources and unique movement mechanics in order to explore this dark digital world.

name: Square Saga: The Trials
summary: Dig, find, and fight your way to victory in this PVP, twin-stick, 2D arcade action title. Tunnel through the post-apocalyptic Earth, master the art of wielding rock cannons and uranium powered lasers, consume tons of speed & strength enhancing power-drinks and ultimately, vanquish your rival!

name: Squarelets
summary: A picture puzzler. Each round starts with an image in a very low resolution (just four squares) and 6 images below it. Tapping on the image reveals higher resolutions. The goal of the game is to guess which of the 6 images was hidden behind the pixelation.

name: Squirrel Knight
summary: Jump, slash, and race against the clock in this classic action-platformer. Adventure as Squirrel Knight to save the forest and discover powerful magic, deadly enemies and hidden secrets along the way.

name: Squirm
summary:
This is a DS port of Squirm, a PacMan style arcade game, from Commodore 16. It reuses all original graphics, in attempts to remain as faithful as possible to the original version.

Navigate around the maze while steering clear of the Squirms.

You need to find and eat 200 eggs laid by the Queen Squirm. And like PacMan, if a squirm gets to you, then you will be back to the start.

name: Squishy Pastries
summary: The goal of Squishy Pastries is to get as high of a score as possible by combining pastries of the same type. The larger the pastry, the more points for combining it. Each of the pastries is a soft body, so they are squishy. If any of the pastries leave the wooden box for more than 5 seconds, the game is over!

name: Squares of Hell
summary: Hell is divided into squares for sinners. For each sin there is a separate square. Bad smoker square - smoker is tempted by unavailable cigarettes. Bad Driver Square - The driver is always pushing the car uphill. Those who make a lot of noise jump up and down on a large subwoofer.

name: Squeakross: Home Squeak Home
summary: In Squeakross: Home Squeak Home, solve and transform puzzles into furniture to decorate the perfect home for your rodent friend. Collect hundreds of decorations, accessories and stickers in this cozy game full of charm!

name: Squaretrail: Lines of The Frame
summary: Squaretrail: Lines of The Frame is a puzzle and adventure game where you progress by rotating square-shaped worlds. Your main character is a cube and you have to overcome different challenges in each level.

name: Squash Sport Game 2024
summary: With Squash Sport Game 2024 you can enjoy the most exciting and fastest racket sport playing in four different scenarios and against six players until you get the best score and leave your name to remember.

name: Squirrels Forest Race
summary: Exciting arcade racing game, inspired by the classic Diddy Kong Racing, from the 90s and the graphics of Nintendo 64 games! 6 squirrels need to find the Golden Nuts and get them back. To do so, they must win the Most Fantastic Races ever seen!

name: Squared Adventure
summary: Embark on a journey through tunnels, caves and ancient temples, solving puzzles and fighting all kinds of hostile creatures. Be smart - avoid traps and think carefully. They say it doesn't hurt ;)

name: Square of Joy
summary: Climb up, reach the top, using nothing but your skill and will. Compete with steam friends and players from all over the world. Discover secrets along the way.

name: Squewe Run
summary:
Squewe Run is is an exciting endless running game.
Be the best and reach the high score.
Collect coins and unlock cute and goofy characters.
Get the strawberry and ride the elephant to smash everything in your path.
Find the wings to get the fly power-up.
Jump in the water for the underwater level.
Collect bonus letters and unlock secret skins.

name: Sqube Escape
summary: A unique action-platformer game set in the Sqube universe. Challenge yourself through 60 levels filled with obstacles and bosses. Choose from four difficulty levels and enjoy immersive graphics and sound.

name: Squid Game: Unleashed
summary:
Prepare for fast, heart-pounding action and brutal competition in this multiplayer battle royale game. Play with friends (or enemies) online and see if you have what it takes to outlast and defeat the other Players in each twisted Contest.

With deadly challenges you'll recognize from "Squid Game," the series, and more new games inspired by classic childhood activities, each round is a dark trip down memory lane. Can you make it through playtime alive?

name: Squirreled Away
summary: Be the squirrel. Scurry through gardens, up trees, and leap limb to limb in this craft and thrive park life adventure. Explore solo or with up to three squirrel buddies in co-op. Meet and help other residents and collect bits here and there to build and decorate your dream treehouse.

name: Sqij'd
summary:
The Bird is back! but not all is well in paradise!

The ENER tree that SQIJ created all those years ago to solve his greedy food problems, has enveloped the planet, demanding you bring it the food it craves to thrive. You swear that you'll not be anyone's lackey forever. You have devised a plan. One that will set you up as the most powerful bird in the universe! well the Undercave Kingdom for sure.

​

IT'S TIME TO FEED THE TREE AND YOU HOPE IT QUITE LITERALLY CHOKES ON IT!

name: Square
summary:
Small intent at a platformer puzzler, explore to understand the mechanics the game is quite self explanatory... or not (SPOILER: if not, try to find the red cubes and find out what to do with them).

Made in 48h for #familiargamejam5 by R3nD (theme was "Deconstruction").

name: Squad: Weapon Skins - Contractors Pack
summary: This pack contains 8 weapon skins for use with the WPMC faction.

name: Squad: Weapon Skins - Clash Pack
summary: This pack contains 2 cosmetic items for use with the VDV faction and 1 cosmetic item for use with the USMC faction.

name: Squash Ball
summary: Welcome to Squash Ball, the ultimate idle clicker sandbox game with physics, themes, clicking stats, and a leveling system. Perfect for casual gamers and those who love to fidget with items digitally. With its colorful design and addicting gameplay, it's easy to pick up and hard to put down.

name: Squidward Tentacles Jigsaw
summary:
You can find particular games which storm your brain even in the initial handful of minutes of game play. These games will make the gamer use his brain for the maximum and finally he will likely be a believe tank of this game. Squidward Tentacles Jigsaw is such a puzzle game that is capable to test your patience and Intelligence quotient. The game attributes 4 difficulty levels and you can opt for 1 based on your experience. You will be offered a shattered Squidward image and you will need to arrange the shattered pieces into a totally fledged snap. A timer is equipped to monitor your moves and this adds the thrill with the game. As a gamer, you’ll need to fight with time as well as your brain to turn out to be a successful puzzle solver. It is possible to use your left mouse button to play this intriguing game. The photographs used in this game are cool and also the sound effects are fantastic.

Use your mouse to play this game

name: Squidward Tractor
summary: Squidward is asked by Mr Crab to clean up trashes around the krusty krab and bring them to city dump.

name: Squadron: Ghost
summary: Squadron: GHOST is a total conversion mod for Half-Life that was being developed in the early 2000s, inspired by anime, manga, and cyberpunk aesthetics. However, the mod's development was canceled at the time. Despite this, it still impresses considering the era in which it was being developed. There is little information available online about this mod.

name: Sqrl Golf II
summary: Golfing with squirrels!

name: Squid: Sponge Neighbor Expose
summary:
Expose the Squid in his new huge house! Play as a sponge! You came to the bottom neighborhood of the city and settled next to the squid neighbor whose name is Bob. You thought he was very kind. He always says hello to strangers. You have learned that he is a ward of a fast food restaurant which is famous for its crab burgers. After some time, you learned that the secret burger recipe was stolen.

Very soon, you began to notice that your new squid neighbor Bob began to behave discreetly. He always looks around and installed surveillance cameras around his house... You decided to find out if he is related to this robbery. Try to get into the house and find evidence. Feel like a detective in the house of your strange sponge’s neighbour.

Your curious character should sneak to Bob’s house unnoticed. If he sees you then it will catch you immediately! You can run away and hide in your sponge house, hide under the beds in his house. Escape it if he will chase you!

The game has been implemented all your wishes. You can change the sensitivity control settings as you like. The game provides you with wide opportunities. You can pick up items and throw them at the squid neighbor to stun him, it will give you some time to escape!

You always wanted to be a detective. Find the secret burger recipe and return it to the owner! In addition to the recipe, the restaurant lost money. You saw that your sponge’s neighbor bought a luxury yacht-car. Bob could not afford to buy it at the salary of the ward of the small restaurant. If he is involved in this - you have to figure it out.

Try to expose the squid in the underwater bottom world!

name: Squaser 3
summary: Squaser 3 is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: SQR
summary: YOU ARE SQR. PART OF YOU IS MISSING.

name: Squawky
summary: A mascot horror game where you use a rubber chicken as a flashlight, modifying it with various energies to solve puzzles. Restore the electricity, explore Sunshine Farms, and be careful not to make loud noises. If Squawky sees or hears you, it will chase you, so if that happens, RUN FOR YOUR LIFE!

name: Sqorp
summary: A short puzzle game about filling a board with tiles. Your objective is to play 24 tiles in the grid, so they match.

name: Squid's Manslaughter
summary: You will wander the earth as the most pathetic and sad organism in existence searching for meaning. At the end of the day though, there isn't any, you're just an empty husk with nothing to lose, might as well gamble your life away...

name: Squaser 4
summary: SQUASER 4 is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: Squaser 2
summary: SQUASER 2 is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: Squaser
summary: SQUASER is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: Square Jump
summary: Have you been looking for a simple game where you are a cube and want to jump on different things? Square Jump is perfect!

name: Square Fishing Builder
summary: Build the fishing village of your dreams! From classic farming RPG games comes a mix with strategy and RTS! Choose the map, build, and fish!

name: Squids in a Pickle
summary: Uh oh, looks like there are squids in a pickle!

name: Squirrel Madness
summary: Be ready for anything, because the battle’s just beginning!

name: Squish
summary: Inspired by the PSP puzzle game Crush; In Squish, the player compresses 2D views into 1D.

name: Squeeze
summary: A casual decryption game. Rotate, jet, and control bubbles to rescue small animals! In this world of water and bubbles, rich mechanisms await your exploration, and many small animals await your rescue. You will definitely have fun playing!!

name: Squat Life
summary: A game that keeps you motivated to do squats, a fun and highly effective exercise, every day

name: Squabble
summary: Squabble is a dynamic Tower Defense-RTS hybrid where strategic resource management is key to fending off relentless waves of enemies.

name: Squares
summary: Slide squares, fill the grid, and solve tricky puzzles!

name: Squiggle Football
summary: Squiggle Football is a deck-building football management roguelike, where you create a team and form powerful combinations of players, coaches, tactics and culture. Recruit, trade & innovate through nail-biting matches to reach & conquer the National League. Inspired by Australian Rules Football.

name: Squat Ops
summary: Squat Ops pretends to be a story rich, single player tactical stealth game, but it's secretly tricking you into working out. Sneak through a deep branching story filled with danger, relying on the connections you forge with your team to unpick twisted enemy plans. Do squats; save the world.

name: Squadron
summary:
Become a Master of the Galaxy with Squadron !
