Squadron is a classic Shoot'em Up. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the Universe from its evil enemies.

Aboard your spacecraft, you will have to get rid of a large number of enemies while dodging their attacks. Will you be skilled enough to understand your enemies strategy and attack patterns?

In this "bullet hell" shooter game, you will be faced with an increasingly large number of projectiles and enemies. As the game progresses, you will earn the right to upgrade your spacecraft to bring it to full lethal capacity.

The game is packed with 30 breath taking levels giving you hours of fun for you and your friends.

The Galaxy's future is now in your hands.

name: Squirrel Horse
summary: Explore! Find an apple for Horse and an acorn for Squirrel.

name: Square Brothers
summary: Two bandit brothers, One epic heist! Solve spatial challenges and steal shiny treasures on this brand new Megadrive game.

name: Squid Game: Game Boy Demake
summary:
A fully playable Game Boy adaptation of Squid Game Season 1, made with love in GB Studio by 64 Bits.

Experience the deadly children's games on your actual Game Boy (or favorite emulator). Includes 3 endings, a secret hard mode, and a lovingly crafted manual you can print and fold yourself - just like the old days.

name: Square & Circles
summary: Play as the cute, surviving square, and destroy the dictatorship of the circles. Shoot, run, explode - do everything but defeat the circles and stay alive. Can you save your friends and your beloved? It all depends on you!

name: Squish Machine
summary: Duck and dodge devious traps before you’re squished!

name: Square Love
summary: A very relaxing and simple thinky game.

name: SQL Island
summary: SQL Island is a text-adventure trying to playfully teach people the SQL database language. It was developed by the German Technische Universität Kaiserslautern.

name: Squarenose Jump
summary: Squarenose has been diligently working for Doctor Megan in the True Pasta laboratories, where genetically modified animals have been testing experimental new pet food. The perfect formula will be used to produce meaty rings that will be eaten by cats and dogs in our sweet homes. But disaster has struck as the experimental pet food has driven the animals into a wild frenzy; surely it is foul play! Old Ram, the leader in the pet food market, will stop at nothing to maintain its dominance in the lucrative industry. Can Squarenose survive the relentless aggression of the wild animals that are approaching?

name: SQRZ
summary: A fast-paced tile-based match-three game. Tracks scores, splits, and has different game modes to choose from.

name: Square: Trial and Error
summary:
Square: Trial and Error is a Puzzle Platformer game where you are tasked with restoring Town Square by completing 20 Trial and Error puzzles!

Each level has its own set of rules that you need to figure out by Trial and Error. No hints or clues are given in each level, and you must rely on observation and the outcome of your actions to figure out each level!

The game has a ton of features and fun for you to have! Find buried treasure, solve the riddle of the glitch zone, form your party, decorate your own home, and more!

name: Squarely
summary: Squarely is a chilled-out puzzle game of precision and strategy. Push, Slide, Boost and Teleport your way through 200 handcrafted levels with no time pressure. Learn new mechanics as you advance, unlock colorful tiles, and challenge yourself to master each puzzle.

name: Squares Proximity
summary: Master the grid in Squares Proximity! A single-player, turn-based strategy game of precise placements and clever captures. Outsmart the AI by placing numbered squares to boost your tiles and steal theirs. Simple rules, deep decisions. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Squaser 7
summary: Squaser 7 is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: ⁤Square Wars
summary: Square Wars is a rogue-lite square-conquering game featuring real-time strategy, resource gathering, survival, and card-based gameplay mechanics.  Randomly generated maps make each game unique. Join the adventure solo, in local co-op with a friend, or online!

name: Squaser X
summary: SQUASER X is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: Squaser 5
summary: SQUASER 5 is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: Squaser 6
summary: Squaser 6 is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: Squad 22: ZOV
summary: Single player tactical action real-time game with active pause to plan orders carefully. Based on real war-time experience of living Russian veterans of war in Ukraine. It's all about modern conflict small infantry groups with some armored vehicle and drone support as well as real events story

name: Squaser 9
summary: SQUASER 9 is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: Squaser 8
summary: SQUASER 8 is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: Squirrel with a Gun: Pride Month Update
summary:
Fight for your right to squirrel arms.

The Pride Month DLC includes:
• Rainbow car spawner
• Rainbow road driving challenge, unlocked while driving the rainbow car
• The "Pride Mode" button which:
– Opens up "Pride Street", a new unlockable neighborhood area
– Allows access to the Pride tank, unlocked after the rainbow road challenge is completed. Beware—unlocking the Pride tank will alert enemy agents!
– Changes the flags around the neighborhood to various Pride-themed flags
• 9 Pride-themed garments
• Gives the throwing reticle a rainbow effect

name: Squirrel Madness & Silent Mist
summary: Two different worlds, one ultimate fight for survival.

name: Squad Arcade
summary: Squad Arcade is a roguelike deckbuilder with a fast-paced arcade twist, where robots collect ancient heroes and myths to fight in tactical card battles. Every run challenges you to build powerful decks, form unique squads, and master unpredictable challenges.

name: Squarepinski
summary: A cozy jigsaw game with a twist; every piece is the same shape, but not the same size! A low-pressure experience with chill piano music and gorgeous hand-drawn line art.

name: Squishy Bird
summary: We do not like Flappy Bird. So we have decided to squish all of those annoying birdies! Simply close the tunnel on top of the flying birds so that they do not pass. Very funny parody on the Flappy Bird series.

name: Squeaky
summary: A flash platformer about a robot.

name: Square Game
summary: Watch the Square bounce around the screen in this idle incremental Game about squares, dots and other shapes. Upgrade, Prestige and even build a deck of awesome abilities in Square Game!

name: Squidly's Revenge
summary: A fast-paced underwater roguelike where a squishy squid with divine powers steals enemy weapons to take revenge on Lord Azure and his Abyssal Cult. Chaos, crustaceans, and cartoon violence await!

name: Squared Straight
summary: These puzzles look like Rubik's cubes, but the stickers slide around instead of the normal twist movement, which changes how you approach the solves. 🤔 Plus, the puzzles can be all different dimensions, and you can create and save mosaic designs in them! ️

name: Squared Notebook Fight
summary: Squared Notebook Fight is a hand-drawn, fast-paced top-down bullet hell shooter where chaos erupts right on the pages of a school notebook. Survive short intense run, dodge flying ink bullets, collect coins, and upgrade your hero with new weapons, shields, or health to become stronger each round.

name: Squidview
summary: Explore the world of White Shell Island, a tropical paradise. Romance islanders, decorate your dream house, fish exotic creatures, grow lush plant life, and cook unique dishes. Customize your islander, pursue hobbies, and discover secrets. Live however you see fit. The world is in your hands!
